item.description:
Presented by the DCR:

"Tuesday, January 1
First Day Hikes 2008
Free hot & hearty soup at noon
All hikes begin at 1:00 pm
Meet at the Houghton's Pond main parking lot, 840 Hillside Street in Milton.
Celebrate the New Year in the Blue Hills. This is year seventeen of our annual New Year?s tradition! Join the fun. Warm up with a free cup of hearty soup, then stretch your legs on a variety of guided hikes suitable for all ages
and abilities. A great way to jump start the year! For more information, call 617-698-1802."

Meet at 12:30 for some of that free soup!
item.name: Blue Hills Fisrt Day Hikes
